/.GET: 200 status and returns an array of all the article objects. (Constrained by limit default value)
/.POST: 201 status and returns an object of the posted article

QUERY.?sort_by={columnName}: 200 status and returns array of all article objects sorted by a given column name. Sorted by 'created_at' column and descending order by default. (Constrained by limit default value)
QUERY.?order={asc/desc}: 200 status and returns an array of all article objects sorted in either ascending or descending order which by default is set to descending. (Constrained by limit default value)
QUERY.?limit={intger}: 200 status and returns an array of article objects limited to the integer provided, which by default is 10
QUERY.?p={integer}: 200 status and works as pagination so other rows in the next limit bracket can be viewed

/:article_id.GET: 200 status and returns an object of the specificed article
/:article_id.PATCH: 202 status and returns an object of the updated article
/:article_id.DELETE: 204 status, deletes specified article and returns no content

/:article_id/comments.GET: 200 status and returns an array of all the comment objects for the specified article
/:article_id/comments.POST: 201 status and returns an object of the posted comment

QUERY.?sort_by={columnName}: 200 status and returns array of all the comment objects for the specified article sorted by a given column name. Sorted by 'created_at' column and descending order by default
QUERY.?order={asc/desc}: 200 status and returns an array of all the comment objects for the specified article sorted in either ascending or descending order (by default set to descending)
QUERY.?limit={intger}: 200 status and returns an array of the comment objects for the specified article limited to the integer provided, which by default is 10
QUERY.?p={integer}: 200 status and works as pagination so other rows in the next limit bracket can be viewed

/:comment_id.PATCH: 202 status and returns an object of the updated comment
/:comment_id.DELETE: 204 status, deletes specified comment and returns no content

/topics.GET: 200 status and returns an array of all the topic objects
/topics.POST: 201 status and returns an object of the posted topic

/users.GET: 200 status and returns an array of all the user objects
/users.POST: 201 status and returns an object of the posted user
